name: Midgard
blurb: World of Midgard is a revolutionary project that brings core gaming to mobile devices:  iPhones, iPads, and all Android-based devices.

rewards.reward: 500 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game)
10 free customizations of the chosen character. In addition you get 1,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes Previous Reward.

Exclusive Epic ICE DRAGON MOUNT! Only our Kickstarter backers will have that mount. Nobody else in the whole game will be able to ride that beast ever. Check how kick-ass ICE DRAGON looks in the image posted in the project description. Ice Dragon mount is ready to be added to the game immediately after this project is successfully funded. In addition you get 1,500 Mithril coins to use in the game (used to get virtual items in the game).

Exclusive Epic kick-ass ICE DRAGON MASK matching your ICE DRAGON. Imagine yourself wearing ICE DRAGON MASK while riding ICE DRAGON when nobody else will be able to get that mask ever. In addition you get 2,500 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 1,500 Mithril coins).

Exclusive Epic ICE DRAGON PET. Ice dragon non-combat pet will be available for all classes and after the Ranger class is added, a combat Ice Dragon pet for Ranger will be offered. Imagine yourself walking around with Ice-Dragon pet following you around and looking up to you - his master/mistress. If you play Ranger class you will able to send your Ice Dragon pet to battle. Appear in the credits list on our website. You also get 3,500 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 4,000 Mithril coins).

Limited digital edition of illustrated World Of Midgard Lore Book signed by our Team. Your very own copy of the game soundtrack. Right of entry to the concealed discussion group that includes developers themselves. By participating in this closed forum you will be able to post your suggestions, for example about your class, and influence the game the most direct way. You also get  6,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 7,500 Mithril coins).

World of Midgard backer T-shirt designed by our artist and a digital art book showcasing concept art from World of Midgard signed by our Team. (Please, add $15 for the international shipping). Access to a secret closed development non-public server where you can play and see everything what is coming to the public severs later on. Special thanks in the credits highlighting your contribution. You also get 10,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 15,000 Mithril coins).

World Of Midgard full size frameable poster signed by our Team, and available exclusively to our Kickstarter backers. Printed copy of the Art of World Of Midgard book, that showcases the concepts and conceptual design of the game signed by the Team. Printed edition of illustrated World Of Midgard Lore Book signed by our Team. (Please add $15 for international shipping). You also get 25,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 25,000 Mithril coins)

Limited edition World of Midgard hoodie designed by our artist. Collection of prints signed by the Team. (Please add $15 additional for international hoodie and art prints shipping). A special listing in the in-game credits under the name of  \u201cWORLD OF MIDGARD CONTRIBUTORS\u201d! \r\n\r\nDirect access to our World Of Midgard redmine project management tool, which is used by developers for every-day game development. You would be able to post suggestions about your class balance, new content you want to see, and any changes you would like to see introduced, and they would go directly to developers who work on the class you play. All your suggestions would be evaluated and responded to. If accepted, the issues you post would be developed. You also get 50,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 50,000 Mithril coins).

The right to name town/camp, leader/commander, or other NPC in the game.\r\nNPC in the game will be named after you. You can use your real name, its variation, or your nickname. The name has to be suitable for a specific NPC, and we will cooperate with you to ensure the appropriate usage for your name. You also get 100,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 100,000 Mithril coins).

The right to design your very own weapon. You will cooperate with our designers and you will be credited as one of the game \u201cweaponsmiths.\u201d \r\nYou also get 200,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 200,000 Mithril coins).

The right to name one of the main geographical sites in the game. You can use your real name, its variation, or your nickname. The name has to be suitable for a specific location, and we will cooperate with you to ensure the appropriate usage for your name. \r\nYou also get 500,000 Free Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 400,000 Mithril coins).

Honorary life VIP membership of Veraxon team and that entitles you to active participation in the development on an ongoing basis and direct email access to the Team. This includes being credited for your contribution to the Team. Free access to all game content forever.  Meeting for lunch with the US part of the Veraxon team in NYC.  You also get 1,000,000 Mithril coins (used to get virtual items in the game). Includes All Previous Rewards (items and 900,000 Mithril coins).
